Message:
Lucille didn’t look back
even once...
I...must mean nothing
to her anymore...

I wonder if she even forgot
everything about...
our vow to each other
that day...

The sands of the hourglass
had long since shifted,
but time has only frozen still
in my heart...

“She was only ever meant
to be yours, wasn’t she?”

Just then, I felt as though
I heard someone whisper
in my ear.

Was that a priest’s voice...?
Or...the voice of my own heart...?

That’s right...
Lucille used to belong
only to me...
But then, they...
